page.title: 15SWAFFHAM PRIOR CHAPEL
page.content: Every Sunday at 10.30.am. the chapel opens for Sunday school and Bible Study which last until 11.30.am. The Sunday school is for children and the Bible Study is for adults. Most Sunday nights there is a service for adults but children can go as well. At this service is a preacher who tells a story and you sing hymns and say prayers as well. On Thursday evenings, from 6.15.pm. until about 8.30.pm. a group called 'The Sun Seekers'meet. At this meeting games, singing and prayers play an important part. Refreshments of squash and biscuits are also provided. Bible Study is also on the agenda. Lots of visits are arranged for this group, such as going to the sea-side,camping and walks. The group is well supported and very much enjoyed.
